mtime low

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x640
Size:
0x4

Description

RISC-V Standard Machine-mode Time Counter, lower 32-bits.
Frequency of counter is indicated in CPTRA_TIMER_CONFIG.clk_period.
Caliptra Access: RW
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] count_l rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

count_l

Counter Low

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_pwrgood
